discourse_list.title: Make governance participation more accessible. Where is the governance voting?

content.content: I have been trying to find a list of open proposals for voting and how to vote on them. However, after a about two hours of googling and exploring websites, I am unable to find such menu.  Where is the app to use my OP tokens to vote on proposals? Can we add a few button links to this app? For example, probably we should place one such button somewhere in https://app.optimism.io/

Hi @nicszerman You couldn’t find any active votes because the Governance is in a Reflection process until August 24th. Season 2 will begin in September 8 with Voting Cycle #6 You can read about it here      Governance Update #3 🏛 Governance   Governance Update #3: Time to Reflect  Wow–it feels like the past two months have absolutely flown by! This governance update includes a brief recap of Season 1, and a collection of documents which the Optimism Foundation has prepared for Season 2. If you want to shape how Season 2 of OP governance works, now’s your chance – please come contribute to the discussions!   Season 1 Voting Recap  With the conclusion of Voting Cycle #4, Season 1 of Token House governance has officially wrapped! For t…     The idea of adding a button link in the Optimism page to here Snapshot is a very good idea
